mapper.select: SELECT RESERVATION_NO,LANTOUR_NO,ROOM_NO,HOTEL_NO,MEMBER_NO,RESERVATION_DATE,RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE , RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY,RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO

SELECT RESERVATION_NO,LANTOUR_NO,ROOM_NO,HOTEL_NO,MEMBER_NO,RESERVATION_DATE,RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE,RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY,RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE LANTOUR_NO = #{lantour_no} AND MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}

SELECT RESERVATION_NO,LANTOUR_NO,ROOM_NO,HOTEL_NO,MEMBER_NO,RESERVATION_DATE,RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE,RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY,RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_NO =#{reservation_no}

SELECT RESERVATION_NO,LANTOUR_NO,ROOM_NO,HOTEL_NO,MEMBER_NO,RESERVATION_DATE,RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE,RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY,RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE LANTOUR_NO = ${lantour_no} AND RESERVATION_PAY != 'cancelled' ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO
SELECT ROOM_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE HOTEL_NO = ${hotel_no} AND RESERVATION_PAY != 'cancelled' GROUP BY ROOM_NO

SELECT RESERVATION_NO,LANTOUR_NO,ROOM_NO,HOTEL_NO,MEMBER_NO,RESERVATION_DATE,RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE,RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY,RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE ROOM_NO = ${room_no} AND HOTEL_NO = ${hotel_no} AND RESERVATION_PAY != 'cancelled' ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO
SELECT RESERVATION_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE LANTOUR_NO = #{lantour_no} AND RESERVATION_DATE = #{reservation_date} AND RESERVATION_PAY != 'cancelled'

SELECT RESERVATION_NO,LANTOUR_NO,ROOM_NO,HOTEL_NO,MEMBER_NO,RESERVATION_DATE,RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE,RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY,RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, LANTOUR_NO, ROOM_NO, HOTEL_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE, RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY, RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND LANTOUR_NO IS NOT NULL AND RESERVATION_PAY != 'cancelled'

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, LANTOUR_NO, ROOM_NO, HOTEL_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE, RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY, RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND HOTEL_NO IS NOT NULL AND RESERVATION_PAY != 'cancelled'

SELECT R.HOTEL_NO FROM RESERVATION R, HOTEL H WHERE TO_DATE(R.RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')>=TO_DATE(#{check_in},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(R.RESERVATION_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(#{check_out},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.HOTEL_NO IS NOT NULL AND R.HOTEL_NO = H.HOTEL_NO AND H.HOTEL_TYPE = #{hotel_type} GROUP BY R.HOTEL_NO ORDER BY R.HOTEL_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_PAYDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS pay_date FROM RESERVATION GROUP BY TO_CHAR(reservation_paydate,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(reservation_paydate,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, R.LANTOUR_NO, R.ROOM_NO, R.HOTEL_NO, R.MEMBER_NO,RESERVATION_DATE,RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE , RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY,RESERVATION_PAYDATE, L.LANTOUR_TITLE, H.HOTEL_TITLE, RO.ROOM_NAME FROM RESERVATION R, HOTEL H, ROOM RO, LANTOUR L WHERE (R.HOTEL_NO = H.HOTEL_NO(+) AND R.ROOM_NO = RO.ROOM_NO(+) AND R.LANTOUR_NO = L.LANTOUR_NO(+)) AND R.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(R.RESERVATION_NO) AS RESERVATION_NO, COUNT(R2.RESERVATION_NO) AS LANTOUR_NO, COUNT(R3.RESERVATION_NO) AS HOTEL_NO FROM RESERVATION R, (SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_PAY = 'N') R2, (SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_PAY = 'cancelled' ) R3 WHERE (R.RESERVATION_NO = R2.RESERVATION_no(+) AND R.RESERVATION_NO = R3.RESERVATION_NO(+)) AND R.ROOM_NO = #{room_no}

SELECT COUNT(R.RESERVATION_NO) AS RESERVATION_NO, COUNT(R2.RESERVATION_NO) AS LANTOUR_NO, COUNT(R3.RESERVATION_NO) AS HOTEL_NO FROM RESERVATION R, (SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_PAY = 'N') R2, (SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_PAY = 'cancelled' ) R3 WHERE (R.RESERVATION_NO = R2.RESERVATION_no(+) AND R.RESERVATION_NO = R3.RESERVATION_NO(+)) AND R.LANTOUR_NO = #{lantour_no}
